youtube.title: Why Kidney Stones Cause Excruciating Pain | Medical Animation
youtube.description: Understand the biology behind kidney stone pain. This animation shows a stone traveling through the ureter, explaining why it causes sharp pain and bleeding. Learn why hydration and kidney health are essential to prevent this. Subscribe for more medical insights!
